customCSS: body, .__pf { 	overflow-x: hidden !important; } div:empty { 	display: initial !important; } .kEJFJs .pfa-arrow { 	right: 0px; 	top: 20px; } .dMRksj i, .eSTvWa i, .fAnrQp i, .juvTbr i { 	margin-right: 0px; } .pf-vs-color.pf-vs-square { 	flex: 1 1; }

Harris Houston

data.value:
Meet the brand new and improved Maserati Epoca Black SH27.
Next to its powerful appearance, this elegant and modern inspired dive watch is packed with many interesting features.
With its 30 ATM water resistance, X1 Superluminova, Ceramic Bezel and screw-down crown,
the Hudson will accompany you with confidence on your nautical adventures.

Water resistance: 30ATM
Case: Steel Bezel Fixed
Bezel: 120 Click Uni-Directional Ceramic Bezel
Crystal: Double Domed Sapphire with AR Coating

data.value: The Maserati Automatic is assembled in La Chaux-de-Fonds, Switzerland. Waterproof testing, entrance inspection and final quality control is also performed in Switzerland. The Swiss Made label is a representation of the ultimate sign of quality - the perfect combination of function and design.

data.placeholder: Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipisicing elit, sed do eiusmod tempor incididunt ut labore et dolore magna aliqua. data.value: The dial for the Maserati Epoca Black SH27 has been refreshed with a more detailed sandblasted effect. The rougher texture plays a beautiful contrast with the polished hour indicators. The entire watch is now equipped with X1 Superluminova, even the red accents will have this lume for an even better usability.

data.value: The supple and comfortable five-piece link metal bracelet has brushed and polished finishes giving the bracelet a sophisticated look and feel. The solid end links with separate links are designed to match the watch case perfectly and give the overall design a solid look.

data.label: How is the case of this watch designed?

data.value: The case for the Hudson MK4 has been completely re-designed from scratch. Giving the watch a 30 ATM water resistance. We have installed a 120 Clicks Uni-Directional Ceramic bezel giving the watch a sophisticated look but remaining practically scratch resistant.

data.label: How is the watch shipped to my place?

data.value: We make every effort to deliver e-commerce orders as quickly and conveniently as possible. Once your order has been processed, you will receive an email confirming your order has shipped. To track your order, visit your account or contact our Customer Care team by email.

data.label: Is it possible to return the product if I’m not satisfied?

data.value: If you are not 100% satisfied with your purchase from us, you can return your item(s) for a full refund within 365 days of purchase. (Returns must be unworn, in the state you received them, and in the original packaging.) Some items ship with an attached security tag.

data.label: Can I exchange my order instead of returning it?

data.value: With us you have the option of exchanging an eligible item instead of returning it for a refund. You may be able to process an exchange yourself for certain eligible items in your account.

data.value: Founded in New York in 1968, Wolfgang is a fashion lifestyle brand with bold, progressive ideals and a sensual aesthetic that is recognized worldwide.The modern and minimalist approach to design, provocative imagery and authentic connectionto culture has resonated across generations for over 50 years elevating everyday essentials to globally iconic status.
